Vaith (river)07937cs9w80aktp114ix3j2rwz3clk0d303p1276812014-04-17T17:10:46ZMcJesusBane23641225:''This article is about the river, for the castle see [[Vaith]].''
[[Image:Vaith River.png|thumb|right|200px|A map showing the location of the Vaith river on the continent of Westeros.]]
The '''Vaith''' is a river in [[Dorne]] and is one of the two major tributaries of the [[Greenblood]], the other being the [[Scourge]]. The two rivers meet at the castle of [[Godsgrace]] to form the [[Greenblood]]. The castle of [[Vaith]] is located on the river, the castle was named after the river, whose name existed previously.Â
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, the Vaith and the Scourge meet to form the Greenblood. It is considered to be one of the major waterways of Dorne.
